title: A tragoedie or dialoge of the vniuste vsurped primacie of the Bishop of Rome, and of all the iust abolishyng of the same, made by master Barnardine Ochine an Italian, [and] translated out of Latine into Englishe by Master Iohn Ponet Doctor of Diuinitie, neuer printed before in any language
author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
publisher: [By N. Hill] for Gwalter Lynne dwellyng on Somers kaye by Byllynges gate],
